rows.label: tev057401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about the Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mimiru if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about the Ma-non in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about the strange events on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about the strange events on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Mimiru for information about Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_SEL1131
rows.name: Ask Mimiru about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Way south of this caravan is Prone citadel.
Friend should stay far away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0002
rows.name:
True, friend not look very tasty, and Prone probably not
going to eat friend...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0003
rows.name:
But Prone still pump friend full of hot ouchy lead!
No one on Mira nastier or more dangerous than Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Merchant Nopon like Mimiru make living by selling
rare items.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0009
rows.name:
But lately, Prone make business very difficult.
No more safe ways to get goods to market![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Mujiji likes to keep up appearances,
so never lets on how bad things really are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Meh! Mimiru and crew really need wonder savior
right about now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Was friend the one who saved the Ma-non and
brought them back to New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Mwa ha ha! Mimiru have merchant contacts all
over Mira. Mimiru know EVERYTHING that go on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0018
rows.name: Friend should not look so surprised![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Anyway, friend did good deed this timeâ€”but remember
that if friend ever stray, Mimiru will be first to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0020
rows.name: So behave! Eyes of Nopon are watching friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Earth friends made big mistake stealing precious
Ganglion statue. No wonder they so upset![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0026
rows.name:
That is why Ganglion unloaded entire arsenal on city.
Mimiru hear all about it from contacts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0027
rows.name:
First rule of Nopon business? Never provoke thick-
skulled alien army. Better to tell army how smart they
are and move in to make sale![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Human friends need to learn how grown-up world
works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hoooo! Human friend is amazing! Friend took
down huge Ganglion machine in Sylvalum, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Merchant Nopon watched the whole thing from
sidelines. Everyone was impressed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0037
rows.name:
Mature thing would have been to recognize certain
defeat and move on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0038
rows.name:
But maybe Earth friends are on to something...
Friends must be reckless enough to attempt the
impossible for miracles to happen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0043
rows.name:
This area is much more peaceful now that friend has
disposed of Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0044
rows.name:
But now super nasty Prone are holing up in citadel
to south.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0045
rows.name: It basically the only place Nopon still fear to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Earth friend should do Mimiru teensy favor...
Put nasty Prone in place and make life easier
for Nopon merchants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1001
rows.name:
Ever since friendship treaty, Nopon merchants across
Mira have been getting protection from BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1002
rows.name:
Seems like problem with Ganglion stopping Nopon
trade routes might go away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1003
rows.name:
Not only that, New LA give Nopon lots of money!
There are not enough words to express joy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1004
rows.name:
Mujiji is too bashful to admit it, but deep down boss
also feels thankful to human friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1009
rows.name:
Nopon merchants have much easier time transporting
goods now that BLADE friends help keep Ganglion
at bay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1010
rows.name:
In fact, business never been better! Friends providing
many exciting new commercial opportunities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1011
rows.name:
Nopon very smart for signing friendship treaty with
strong, tough ruffians like friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057401_MSG1012
rows.name:
Mujiji is too bashful to admit it, but deep down boss
also feels thankful to human friends.[ST:wait ]
